title: Aqara announces new Smart Door Lock A100 with Apple HomeKit and Home Key support
content:
Smart home products provider Aqara on Monday announced its new Smart Door Lock A100 Zigbee, which features advanced authentication technologies and support for leading home automation protocols. For Apple users, it works with HomeKit and Home Keys in the Wallet app.

moreâ€¦

The post Aqara announces new Smart Door Lock A100 with Apple HomeKit and Home Key support appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: With a modern and elegant design, the Aqara A100 Zigbee lock is all equipped with Apple's HomeKit and even Home Key support.
